full_summary:
# Cultural and Archaeological Assessment and Monitoring Services Source List

**Procurement Information**
=====================================

**Reference Number**: KN23SL01
**Publication Date**: March 31, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM
**Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
**Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
**Procurement Status**: Expired

**Background**
-------------

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking services from consulting firms to establish a Source List (SL) for cultural and archaeological assessment and monitoring services. The SL will be used to provide professional services on an as-needed basis for various locations in Ontario, including Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston, Royal Military College (RMC), and Fort Frontenac.

**Requirements**
---------------

The selected firms will be contracted to provide services for a period of three (3) years, with a maximum estimated value of $750,000. The commissions under the SL are expected to be valued between $5,000 and $40,000, with a maximum value of $350,000 per commission. Services will include but not be limited to:

* Project Manager
* Lead Archaeologist
* Archaeological Field Surveyor
* Junior Archaeology Technologist
* GIS Drafting Technician
* Total Classification Rate
* Maximum Upset Unit Travel Rate to CFB Kingston

**Eligibility and Evaluation**
---------------------------

Eligible consultants will be assessed based on the established criteria in the Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) document. The evaluation will consider factors such as the consultant's expertise, qualifications, and experience in providing cultural and archaeological assessment and monitoring services.

**Submission Instructions**
-------------------------

Proposers are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the tender closing date. Bidding documents are available on the MERX website at [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

**Points of Contact**
---------------------

For more information, please contact Andrew Webster, DCC, at (613) 949-7930 or [andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca). Contract award results will be posted on the DCC website.
